description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts that relate to the taxonomy language found in either the HITRUST Threat Catalogue or the ENISA Threat Taxonomy.
name: OSRS Operational Framewrok - Environmental Threat
source: HITRUST Threat Catalogue and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: Prolonged period of abnormally low rainfall, and a shortage of water causing damage to assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFC1 Drought

values.description: Water vapor in the air that can collect as condensation causing water damage to assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFE1 Humidity

values.description: The collection of tiny foreign particles that can have an adverse effect on assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFE2 Contaminants

values.description: Chemical (i.e. gaseous or liquid) contaminants causing corrosion of assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFE3 Corrosion

values.description: A mass of snow, ice, and rocks falling rapidly down a mountainside damaging structures or assets in its path.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFG1 Avalanche

values.description: Sudden movement of a block of the Earthâ€™s crust along a geological fault and associated ground shaking with the potential to damage assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFG2 Earthquake

values.description: The sliding down of a mass of earth or rock from a mountain or cliff damaging structures or assets in its path.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFG3 Landslide

values.description: A large hole that suddenly appears in the ground when the surface of the ground is no longer supported causing damage to anything resting on that surface.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFG4 Sinkhole

values.description: Damage of asset caused by eruption and lava.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFG5 Volcano

values.description: An uncontrolled or non-prescribed combustion of burning vegetation in a natural setting with the potential to damage or disrupt.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFG6 Wildfires

values.description: Eroding of a surface by water causing damage to structures and assets on the surface.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFH1 Erosion

values.description: An overflowing of a large amount of water beyond its normal confines, especially over what is normally dry land causing damage to assets in the flood path.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFH2 Flood

values.description: Damage from a long high sea wave caused by a underwater earthquake, landslide or other disturbance.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFH3 Tsunami

values.description: Severe snowstorm with high winds and low visibility that can cause damage or accessibility issues.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFM1 Blizzard

values.description: Rapid circulation of air around a low pressure center with destructive surrounding weather causing damage and accessibility issues.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFM2 Cyclonic Storms

values.description: A storm that produces hail which reaches the surface causing damage.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFM3 Hailstorm

values.description: A prolonged period of abnormally hot weather that can impact people and electronic systems.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFM4 Heat Waves

values.description: A storm of freezing rain which can damage assets.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFM5 Ice Storm

values.description: Damage of asset caused by a lightning strike (electrical overvoltage).
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: HITRUST PFM6 Lightning

values.description: Threat of fire.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Fire

values.description: Threat of disruption of work of IT systems (hardware) dur to pollution, dust or corrosion (arising from the air).
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Pollution, Dust, or Corrosion

values.description: Threat of damage of IT hardware caused by the thunder strike (the electrical overvoltage).
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Thunder Strike

values.description: Threat of damage of IT hardware caused by the water.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Water

values.description: Threat of damage or disruption via explosive force.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Explosion

values.description: Threat of damage or disruption via exposure to harmful radioactive effects.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Dangerous Radiation Leak

values.description: Threat of disruption of work of IT systems due to climatic conditions that have the negative effect on hardware. For example, extensive heat or humidity.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Unfavorable Climatic Conditions

values.description: Threat from major evenvironmental events such as heavy rains or high winds.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Major Environment Events

values.description: Threats of the negative impact of solar radiation (harmful rays) to a satellites and radio wave communication systems - Electromagnetic storm.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Threats from Space or Electromagnetic Storm

values.description: Threat of damage or disruption via local wildlife (i.e. squirrel chew).
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Wildlife

values.description: Large scale and large effects natural disasters. May include natural earthquakes, floods, landslides, heavy rains, and heavy winds.
values.value: OSRS Operational Framework Environmental Threat: ENISA Disaster
